titleStmt.title: The confutation of the abbote of Crosraguels masse, set furth by Maister George Hay ...
titleStmt.author: Hay, George, d. 1588.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Lekpreuik, and are to be sauld at his hous at the nether Bow. Cum priuilegio,

notesStmt.note: Prints and answers excerpts of a MS. treatise.--STC.
Some print show-through; title page stained, affecting print.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his hous at the nether Bow. Cum priuilegio
